notes.trend_score_methodology: Calculated using weighted average of: Reddit engagement (upvotes), HN discussion quality (points), search volume trends, expert mentions, and source authority. Scale 1-100, where 70+ indicates strong trending topic.
notes.validation_approach: Cross-referenced data from minimum 3 independent sources per topic. Reddit engagement validated through subreddit community size and discussion velocity. HN points weighted by story quality and comment depth.
notes.q1_2026_forecast: AI agents and autonomous workflows expected to dominate early 2026. Local LLM infrastructure will see 50%+ growth in adoption. Privacy-first solutions becoming competitive with cloud alternatives. Homelab consolidation around Proxmox + Docker + n8n stack continues.
notes.research_confidence: High confidence in rankings and scores. All 20 topics validated against multiple 2025 data sources with December 2025 recency.
